TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit RangeValidator extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseCompareValidator

summary.span: 检查输入控件的值是否在值的指定范围内。

span.span: Checks whether the value of an input control is within a specified range of values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件测试输入控件的值是否在指定的范围内。The control tests whether the value of an input control is within a specified range. 控件使用四个键属性来执行验证。The control uses four key properties to perform its validation. 属性包含要验证的输入控件。The property contains the input control to validate. 和 属性指定有效范围的最小值和最大值。The and properties specify the minimum and maximum values of the valid range. 属性用于指定要比较的值的数据类型。The property is used to specify the data type of the values to compare. 要比较的值在执行验证操作前转换为此数据类型。The values to compare are converted to this data type before the validation operation is performed. > [!NOTE] > 如果将 属性设置为 ，并且当前日历类型为非公历，则验证程序将仅执行服务器端验证。When the property is set to and the current calendar type is non-Gregorian, the validator performs server-side validation only. 验证程序客户端脚本仅支持公历日历。The validator client script supports only Gregorian calendars. 下表列出了可以比较的不同数据类型。The following table lists the different data types that can be compared. |数据类型Data Type|说明Description| |---------------|-----------------| |`String`|字符串数据类型。A string data type.| |`Integer`|32 位有符号整数数据类型。A 32-bit signed integer data type.| |`Double`|双精度浮点数字数据类型。A double-precision floating point number data type.| |`Date`|日期数据类型。A date data type.| |`Currency`|可以包含货币符号的 decimal 数据类型。A decimal data type that can contain currency symbols.| > [!NOTE] > 如果输入控件为空，则验证成功。Validation succeeds if the input control is empty. 使用 控件使输入控件成为必填字段。Use a control to make the input control a mandatory field. > [!NOTE] > 如果或属性指定的值 无法转换为指定的，则该控件引发异常 。The control throws an exception if the value specified by the or property cannot be converted to the specified . > [!NOTE] > 在 控件内使用控件时 ，请确保验证程序控件及其关联的控件位于同一面板中。When you use the control inside an control, make sure that the validator control and the control it is associated with are in the same panel. 有关将 控件用于部分页面更新的详细信息，请参阅 [部分页呈现概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/bb386573(v=vs.100))。For more information about using the control for partial-page updates, see [Partial-Page Rendering Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/bb386573(v=vs.100)). 有关验证控件的其他信息，请参阅 。For additional information on validation controls, see . ## 可访问性Accessibility 有关如何配置此控件以生成符合辅助功能标准的标记的信息，请参阅 [Visual Studio 中的辅助功能和 ASP.NET](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/ms228004(v=vs.140)) 和 [ASP.NET 控件和辅助功能](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/ms227996(v=vs.140))。For information about how to configure this control so that it generates markup that conforms to accessibility standards, see [Accessibility in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/ms228004(v=vs.140)) and [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/ms227996(v=vs.140)). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何在网页上创建一个 控件，以确定输入控件中输入的值是否在比较范围内。The following example demonstrates how to create a control on the Web page to determine whether the value entered into an input control is within the comparison range. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100)). summary.span: 将需要呈现的控件的 HTML 特性和样式添加到指定的 对象中。

span.span: Adds the HTML attributes and styles for the control that need to be rendered to the specified object.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写 自定义服务器控件中的方法，使 文本始终显示为粗体。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method in a custom server control so that the text always displays as bold. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100)). [!code-aspx-csharp[CustomRangeValidatorAddAttributesToRender#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomRangeValidatorAddAttributesToRender/CS/custom_rangevalidator_addattributestorendercs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CustomRangeValidatorAddAttributesToRender#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomRangeValidatorAddAttributesToRender/VB/custom_rangevalidator_addattributestorendervb.aspx#1)] [!code-csharp[CustomRangeValidatorAddAttributesToRender#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomRangeValidatorAddAttributesToRender/CS/custom_rangevalidator_addattributestorender.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CustomRangeValidatorAddAttributesToRender#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomRangeValidatorAddAttributesToRender/VB/custom_rangevalidator_addattributestorender.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写 自定义服务器控件中的方法，以便它始终验证值是否存在，并在为指定的最大值和最小值范围内 。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method in a custom server control so that it always validates that the value exists and is within the maximum and minimum values specified for the . [!code-aspx-csharp[CustomRangeValidatorEvaluateIsValid#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomRangeValidatorEvaluateIsValid/CS/custom_rangevalidator_evaluateisvalidcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CustomRangeValidatorEvaluateIsValid#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomRangeValidatorEvaluateIsValid/VB/custom_rangevalidator_evaluateisvalidvb.aspx#1)] [!code-csharp[CustomRangeValidatorEvaluateIsValid#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomRangeValidatorEvaluateIsValid/CS/custom_rangevalidator_evaluateisvalid.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CustomRangeValidatorEvaluateIsValid#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomRangeValidatorEvaluateIsValid/VB/custom_rangevalidator_evaluateisvalid.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ MaximumValue { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.MaximumValue : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置验证范围的最大值。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum value of the validation range.
The maximum value of the validation range.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性指定验证范围的最大值。Use the property to specify the maximum value of the validation range. 如果此属性指定的值无法转换为属性指定的数据类型 ，则会引发异常。If the value specified by this property fails to convert to the data type specified by the property, an exception is thrown. > [!NOTE] > 如果 `ValidationDataType.Date` 为 属性指定，但不以编程方式设置应用程序的区域性，则应使用和属性的非特定区域性格式，如 YYYY/MM/DD 。If you specify `ValidationDataType.Date` for the property without programmatically setting the culture for the application, you should use a culture-neutral format, such as YYYY/MM/DD, for the and properties. 否则，可能无法正确解释日期。Otherwise, the date may not be interpreted correctly. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和 [ASP.NET 主题和外观](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100))。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性指定验证范围的最大值。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the maximum value of the validation range. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100)). [!code-aspx-csharp[RangeValidator#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/RangeValidator/CS/rangevalidatorcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[RangeValidator#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/RangeValidator/VB/rangevalidatorvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置验证范围的最小值。

span.span: Gets or sets the minimum value of the validation range.
The minimum value of the validation range.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性指定验证范围的最小值。Use the property to specify the minimum value of the validation range. 如果此属性指定的值无法转换为属性指定的数据类型 ，则会引发异常。If the value specified by this property fails to convert to the data type specified by the property, an exception is thrown. > [!NOTE] > 如果 `ValidationDataType.Date` 为 属性指定，但不以编程方式设置应用程序的区域性，则应使用和属性的非特定区域性格式，如 YYYY/MM/DD 。If you specify `ValidationDataType.Date` for the property without programmatically setting the culture for the application, you should use a culture-neutral format, such as YYYY/MM/DD, for the and properties. 否则，可能无法正确解释日期。Otherwise, the date may not be interpreted correctly. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和 [ASP.NET 主题和外观](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100))。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性指定验证范围的最小值。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the minimum value of the validation range. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100)).
